title: CBM Calculator â€“ Cubic Meter Volume for Boxes, Pallets & Containers

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Basic CBM formula \(\text{CBM} = L \times W \times H\) where \(L, W, H\) are the length, width and height in meters. For multiple identical pieces \(\text{Total CBM} = \text{CBM per piece} \times \text{Quantity}\)
